short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Skip Ad on youtube like a Nice person

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you also too lazy to click on the Skip Ad button? This extension will click on the Skip Ad for you. So just start your YouTube marathon, and let it skip ad for you, like a nice person, after the timer allows you to.
